review.reviewBody: Gobhi pakora was one of the best I have had in vancouver... This place is really good for starters and snacks so far... Chat papdi was well made too.... Only gobhi manchurian is so much of flour and undercooked and sweetish....
Food was very delicious Especially enjoyed the Palak Paneer
Best food in vancouver. Amazing food tastes just like home their veg thali was fabulous
Great quality, awesome taste, great value.
The paneer pakora was awesome!! Best one I've had so far :)
